General.Name: Menthobi Karyatama Raya
General.Description: PT Menthobi Karyatama Raya Tbk engages in the cultivation and development of palm oil plantations; and crude palm oil processing activities and related derivative products. The company provides palm kernel and fresh fruit bunches; management services; develops and manages plasma plantations. It is also involved in waste management and transportation services. PT Menthobi Karyatama Raya Tbk was founded in 2017 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Wisma Maktour Lt.4, East Jakarta, Indonesia, 13330
